name: Colorful Void
description:
Made for the Brackeys Jam 3 in a week.

A fast pace randomly generated void with lasers!

The longer you can survive the faster you get,

Blue squares give you extra points, and avoid touching the walls.

use WASD to move.

Made by Chaos Minds
